description.english: Arrive in front of Pluto's gates.
description.german: Erreichen Sie die Tore von Pluto.
description.french: Arrivez face aux portes de Pluton.
description.italian: Arrivo alle porte di Plutone.
description.spanish: Llega frente a las puertas de Plutón.
description.japanese: プルートのゲート前に到着。
description.brazilian: Chegue em frente aos portões de Plutão.

description.english: Arrive in front of the enormous Temple of Pluto.
description.german: Kommen Sie vor dem riesigen Pluto-Tempel an.
description.french: Arrivez face à l'énorme temple de Pluton.
description.italian: Arrivo davanti all'enorme Tempio di Plutone.
description.spanish: Llegue frente al enorme Templo de Plutón.
description.schinese: 到达巨大的冥王神庙前。
description.japanese: 巨大なプルート神殿の前に到着。
description.brazilian: Chegue em frente ao enorme Templo de Plutão.

description.english: Free the horse from these restraints.
description.german: Befreie das Pferd von diesen Fesseln.
description.french: Libérez le cheval de ces entraves.
description.italian: Libera il cavallo da queste restrizioni.
description.spanish: Libere al caballo de estas ataduras.
description.schinese: 将马从这些束缚中解放出来。
description.japanese: これらの拘束から馬を解放します。
description.brazilian: Liberte o cavalo dessas restrições.

description.english: Complete the tutorial.
description.german: Schließe das Tutorial ab.
description.french: Terminez le tutoriel.
description.italian: Completa il tutorial.
description.spanish: Completa el tutorial.
description.japanese: チュートリアルを完了します。
description.brazilian: Conclua o tutorial.

description.english: Discover the statue of Pluto, guardian and king of the underworld.
description.german: Entdecken Sie die Statue von Pluto, Wächter und König der Unterwelt.
description.french: Découvrez la statue de Pluton, gardien et roi des enfers.
description.italian: Scopri la statua di Plutone, guardiano e re degli inferi.
description.koreana: 지하 세계의 수호자이자 왕인 명왕성의 동상을 발견하세요.
description.spanish: Descubre la estatua de Plutón, guardián y rey del inframundo.
description.schinese: 发现冥王星、冥界的守护者和国王的雕像。
description.russian: Откройте для себя статую Плутона, стража и короля подземного мира.
description.japanese: 冥界の守護者であり王であるプルートの像を発見してください。
description.polish: Odkryj posąg Plutona, strażnika i króla podziemi.
description.brazilian: Descubra a estátua de Plutão, guardião e rei do submundo.

description.english: Discover the statue of Proserpina, queen of the underworld and goddess of spring.
description.german: Entdecken Sie die Statue von Proserpina, Königin der Unterwelt und Göttin des Frühlings.
description.french: Découvrez la statue de Proserpine, reine des enfers et déesse du printemps.
description.italian: Scopri la statua di Proserpina, regina degli inferi e dea della primavera.
description.koreana: 지하 세계의 여왕이자 봄의 여신인 프로세르피나의 동상을 발견하세요.
description.spanish: Descubre la estatua de Proserpina, reina del inframundo y diosa de la primavera.
description.schinese: 发现冥界女王和春天女神普罗瑟皮娜的雕像。
description.russian: Откройте для себя статую Прозерпины, королевы подземного мира и богини весны.
description.japanese: 冥界の女王であり、春の女神であるプロセルピナの像を発見してください。
description.polish: Odkryj posąg Prozerpiny, królowej podziemi i bogini wiosny.
description.brazilian: Descubra a estátua de Proserpina, rainha do submundo e deusa da primavera.

description.english: Solve the tintinnabulum riddle.
description.german: Löse das Tintinnabulum-Rätsel.
description.french: Résolvez l'énigme du tintinnabulum.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma del tintinnabulum.
description.spanish: Resuelve el acertijo del tintinnabulum
description.schinese: 解决 丁丁香 谜语。
description.japanese: 耳鳴りの謎を解きます。
description.brazilian: Resolva o enigma do tintinabulum.

description.english: Collect the first black bean.
description.german: Sammle die erste schwarze Bohne.
description.french: Récupérez la première fève noire.
description.italian: Raccogli il primo fagiolo nero.
description.spanish: Recoge el primer frijol negro.
description.japanese: 最初の黒豆を集める。
description.brazilian: Colete o primeiro feijão preto.

description.english: God of the sea and oceans, protector of fishermen and horses.
description.german: Gott der Meere und Ozeane, Beschützer der Fischer und Pferde.
description.french: Dieu de la mer et des océans, protecteur des pêcheurs et des chevaux.
description.italian: Dio del mare e degli oceani, protettore dei pescatori e dei cavalli.
description.koreana: 바다와 대양의 신, 어부와 말의 수호자.
description.spanish: Dios del mar y los océanos, protector de los pescadores y los caballos.
description.schinese: 海洋之神，渔民和马匹的保护者。
description.russian: Бог морей и океанов, защитник рыбаков и лошадей.
description.japanese: 海と海の神、漁師と馬の保護者
description.polish: Bóg mórz i oceanów, opiekun rybaków i koni.
description.brazilian: Deus do mar e dos oceanos, protetor dos pescadores e dos cavalos.

description.english: Goddess of the raging waters and one of the consorts of Neptune.
description.german: Göttin der reißenden Wasser und eine von Neptuns Frauen.
description.french: Déesse des eaux déchaine et l'une des épouses de Neptune.
description.italian: Dea delle acque impetuose e una delle mogli di Nettuno.
description.koreana: 거센 물의 여신이자 넵튠의 아내 중 한 명입니다.
description.spanish: Diosa de las aguas embravecidas y una de las esposas de Neptuno.
description.schinese: 狂涛女神和海王星的妻子之一。
description.russian: Богиня бушующих вод и одна из жен Нептуна.
description.japanese: 荒れ狂う水の女神であり、ネプチューンの妻の 1 人です。
description.polish: Bogini szalejących wód i jedna z żon Neptuna.
description.brazilian: Deusa das águas furiosas e uma das esposas de Netuno.

description.english: Goddess of calm waters and one of the wives of Neptune.
description.german: Göttin der stillen Gewässer und eine von Neptuns Frauen
description.french: Déesse des eaux calmes et l'une des épouses de Neptune
description.italian: Dea delle acque tranquille e una delle mogli di Nettuno.
description.koreana: 고요한 물의 여신이자 넵튠의 아내 중 한 명.
description.spanish: Diosa de las aguas tranquilas y una de las esposas de Neptuno.
description.schinese: 静水女神和海王星的妻子之一
description.russian: Богиня тихих вод и одна из жен Нептуна
description.japanese: 静水の女神でネプチューンの妻の 1 人
description.polish: Bogini wód stojących i jedna z żon Neptuna
description.brazilian: Deusa das águas tranquilas e uma das esposas de Netuno.

description.english: Solve the riddle of the Fountains of Neptune.
description.german: Löse das Rätsel der Neptunbrunnen.
description.french: Résolvez l'énigme des fontaines de Neptune.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma delle fontane di Nettuno.
description.spanish: Resuelve el rompecabezas de las fuentes de Neptuno.
description.japanese: ネプチューンの泉のパズルを解いてください。
description.brazilian: Resolva o quebra-cabeça das Fontes de Netuno.

description.english: Discover the statue of Somnus, god of sleep and guardian of the night.
description.french: Découvrez la statue de Somnus, dieu du sommeil et gardien de la nuit.
description.german: Entdecken Sie die Statue von Somnus, Gott des Schlafes und Wächter der Nacht.
description.italian: Scoprite la statua di Somnus, dio del sonno e guardiano della notte.
description.koreana: 수면의 신이자 밤의 수호자 솜누스의 조각상을 발견하세요.
description.spanish: Descubre la estatua de Somnus, dios del sueño y guardián de la noche.
description.schinese: 发现索姆纳斯雕像，睡眠之神和黑夜守护神
description.russian: Откройте для себя статую Сомнуса, бога сна и хранителя ночи.
description.japanese: 眠りの神、夜の守護神ソムヌスの像を発見する
description.polish: Odkryj posąg Somnusa, boga snu i strażnika nocy.
description.brazilian: Descubra a estátua de Somnus, deus do sono e guardião da noite.

description.english: Solve the riddle of the mirrors.
description.french: Résolvez l'énigme des miroirs.
description.german: Lösen Sie das Rätsel der Spiegel.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma degli specchi.
description.spanish: Resuelve el enigma de los espejos.
description.japanese: 鏡の謎を解け
description.brazilian: Resolva o enigma dos espelhos.

description.english: Discover the statue of Tellus, goddess of mother earth and the seasons.
description.french: Découvrez la statue de Tellus, déesse de la terre mère et des saisons.
description.german: Entdecken Sie die Statue von Tellus, der Göttin der Mutter Erde und der Jahreszeiten.
description.italian: Scoprite la statua di Tellus, dea della madre terra e delle stagioni.
description.koreana: 대지와 사계절의 여신 텔루스의 조각상을 발견하세요.
description.spanish: Descubre la estatua de Tellus, diosa de la madre tierra y de las estaciones.
description.schinese: 发现大地之母和四季女神泰勒斯的雕像
description.russian: Найдите статую Теллус, богини земли и времен года.
description.japanese: 母なる大地と季節の女神テルスの像を発見せよ
description.polish: Odkryj posąg Tellus, bogini matki ziemi i pór roku.
description.brazilian: Descubra a estátua de Tellus, deusa da mãe terra e das estações do ano.

description.english: Solve the riddle of the solstice and equinox months.
description.french: Résolvez l'énigme des mois des solstices et équinoxes.
description.german: Lösen Sie das Rätsel der Monate der Sonnenwenden und Tagundnachtgleichen.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma dei mesi solstiziali ed equinoziali.
description.spanish: Resuelve el enigma de los meses del solsticio y el equinoccio.
description.russian: Разгадайте загадку месяцев солнцестояния и равноденствия.
description.japanese: 夏至と彼岸の謎を解く
description.polish: Rozwiąż zagadkę miesięcy przesilenia i równonocy.
description.brazilian: Resolva o enigma dos meses do solstício e do equinócio.

description.english: Solve the puzzle of the bridge.
description.french: Résolvez l'énigme du pont à reconstituer.
description.german: Löse das Rätsel der Brücke, die wieder zusammengesetzt werden muss.
description.italian: Risolvere l'enigma del ponte da ricostruire.
description.spanish: Resuelve el enigma del puente que hay que reconstruir.
description.russian: Разгадайте загадку моста, который нужно реконструировать.
description.japanese: 再建される橋の謎を解く
description.polish: Rozwiąż zagadkę mostu, który ma zostać zrekonstruowany.
description.brazilian: Resolva o enigma da ponte a ser reconstruída.

description.english: Discover the statue of Minerva, goddess of wisdom, cunning and intelligence.
description.french: Découvrez la statue de Minerve, déesse de la sagesse, de la ruse et de l'intelligence.
description.german: Entdecken Sie die Statue von Minerva, der Göttin der Weisheit, List und Klugheit.
description.italian: Scoprite la statua di Minerva, dea della saggezza, dell'astuzia e dell'intelligenza.
description.koreana: 지혜와 교활함, 지성의 여신 미네르바의 동상을 발견하세요.
description.spanish: Descubre la estatua de Minerva, diosa de la sabiduría, la astucia y la inteligencia.
description.schinese: 发现密涅瓦雕像，智慧、狡猾和智慧的女神。
description.russian: Откройте для себя статую Минервы, богини мудрости, хитрости и ума.
description.japanese: 知恵と狡猾さと知性の女神、ミネルヴァ像を発見する
description.polish: Odkryj posąg Minerwy, bogini mądrości, przebiegłości i inteligencji.
description.brazilian: Descobre a estátua de Minerva, deusa da sabedoria, da astúcia e da inteligência.

description.english: Solve the riddle of Minerva's door.
description.french: Résolvez l'énigme de la porte de Minerve.
description.german: Löse das Rätsel um die Tür der Minerva.
description.italian: Risolvete l'enigma della porta di Minerva.
description.spanish: Resuelve el enigma de la puerta de Minerva.
description.japanese: ミネルヴァの扉の謎を解け
description.brazilian: Resolve o enigma da porta de Minerva.

description.english: Arrive opposite the Theater of Minerva.
description.french: Arrivez face au théâtre de Minerve.
description.german: Erreichen Sie gegenüber dem Theater der Minerva.
description.italian: Arrivate di fronte al Teatro di Minerva.
description.spanish: Llega frente al Teatro de Minerva.
description.japanese: ミネルヴァ劇場の向かいに到着する
description.brazilian: Chegar em frente ao Teatro de Minerva.

description.english: Enter the immense caverns of Somnus.
description.french: Pénétrez dans les immenses cavernes de Somnus.
description.german: Betreten Sie die riesigen Höhlen von Somnus.
description.italian: Entrate nelle immense caverne di Somnus.
description.spanish: Entra en las inmensas cavernas de Somnus.
description.schinese: 进入索姆努斯的巨大洞穴。
description.japanese: ソムヌスの巨大な洞窟に入る
description.brazilian: Entra nas imensas cavernas de Somnus.

description.english: Enter the temple of Pluto.
description.french: Pénétrez dans le temple de Pluton.
description.german: Betreten Sie den Tempel des Pluto.
description.italian: Entrate nel tempio di Plutone.
description.spanish: Entra en el templo de Plutón.
description.japanese: 冥王星の神殿に入る
description.brazilian: Entra no templo de Plutão.

displayName.english: The end of the Lemures festival
displayName.french: La fin de la fête des Lemures
displayName.german: Das Ende des Festes der Lemuren
displayName.italian: La fine della festa dei Lemuri
displayName.spanish: El final del festival de los Lemures
displayName.japanese: レムレス祭りの終わり

description.english: Retrieve the last black bean.
description.french: Récupérez la dernière fève noire.
description.german: Sammeln Sie die letzte schwarze Bohne.
description.italian: Recuperate l'ultimo fagiolo nero.
description.spanish: Recupera la última judía negra.
description.japanese: 最後の黒豆を取り戻す
description.brazilian: Recuperar o último feijão preto.

description.english: Enter the realm of Pluto.
description.french: Pénétrez dans le royaume de Pluton.
description.german: Betreten Sie das Reich des Pluto.
description.italian: Entrate nel regno di Plutone.
description.spanish: Entra en el reino de Plutón.
description.japanese: 冥王星の領域に入る
description.brazilian: Entrar no reino de Plutão.

description.english: Here, at the end of all things.
description.french: Ici, à la fin de toutes choses.
description.german: Hier, am Ende aller Dinge.
description.italian: Qui, alla fine di tutte le cose.
description.spanish: Aquí, al final de todas las cosas.
description.japanese: ここ、全ての終わり
description.brazilian: Aqui, no fim de todas as coisas.
